live_updates: We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
28276.summary: Some customers in the Greater Vancouver Zoo area of Langley are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
28276.title: Oct 30 – Langley (Greater Vancouver Zoo) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
